attributes.action: make it absolutely clear to ALL MP's that unless they stop whining and repay their expenses, as requested, we will ensure that said MP's  LOSE the vote of the electorate in the next General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, like many others, are fed up with hearing MP's complaining about repaying their expenses. OK, we accept that there may be employment rights which operate here - but THEY helped write the rules in the first place. They should hardly complain that we are unhappy with the way the rules were implemented.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
